main event: A witness observed a bright object in the sky that changed shapes, moving up, down, and side-to-side for 30 minutes on 17 October 1959.
interesting points: The object was initially compared in size to a dime but appeared to change sizes dramatically,The object was described as being extremely brilliant and almost star-like,The witness reported seeing the object moving with him for about 20-25 minutes,The object was seen at a low altitude within fog,It was estimated that the object was traveling at a speed of 4,600 ft/sec.
